metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Bad Girls is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Bad Girls is written in the key of C♯ Mixolydian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 9th most popular key among Mixolydian keys and     the 40th most popular  among all keys. The C♯ Mixolydian scale is similar to the C♯ Major scale except that its 7th note (B) is a half step lower.  Mixolydian chord progressions are heavily featured in many genres of music like classic rock, which relies on the major chord built on the 7th scale degree. 

See the C♯ Mixolydian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
